title: What Jungler should I buy?
body:
I already have Zac and Fiddlesticks so I dont need an ap jungler or a massively tanky one, I was looking for more of an assassin. Or a champ that deals good damage and is tanky The ones I was considering are
-Gragas
-Shaco
-Nocturne 
-Rengar
-Kha Zix
-Hecarim

Please give me your honest opinion on what jungler I should buy :)

replies.body: i'm a semi jarvan jungle main and he's an incredibly fun jungler, used in higher elo's as well. Although a little hard to learn and use when you first pick him up, there is nothing like rushing into a lane, e, qing through a champ and then ulting them and watching the laner do the rest of the work. complete satisfaction.

Nocturne sounds like he'd fit the bill for you, as you can build him either damage or more tanky. Plus his ulti is like the assassination ultimate that dreams are made of and is virtually the best gank in the game. Gragas is always incredibly consistent as a jungler and brings a lot to a team too.
Now im crazy torn between nocturne and gragas ;-;
You did say you didn't need another AP or tank jungle. I would go for Nocturne or Graves, both are similar.
